Posts.Content: May 29, 2014 04:40PM shlichte wrote: Finished A/C, Taxol and Herceptin in 12/12.  SE have been brutal.  Neuropathy and joint and muscle pain along with fatigue.  Pain in shoulder, ribs, ankles and feet.  Onc. have no answers.  Have been to orthopedic doctors and GP with nothing found except fracture in rib.  The joint and muscle pain seem to get worse as does the fatigue.  Any suggestions or information would be helpful.
Posts.Title: Any words of wisdom for Taxol? lanagraves shlichte
